description: Ministry of Urban Development, Water Supply and Drainage - Order to approve the acquisition of the immovable property in Diddenipotha North, Makandura D/S Division, Matara District for the constructions and Makandura Water Supply Project and properties in Nawinnapitiya, Galhinna, Deddeniya and Medagoda in Pujapitiya D/S Division, Kandy District for the constructions under Kandy North - Pathadumbara Integrated Water Supply Project
